name: Cho%27Kri
content:
Cho'Kri was the name of a Vorn tiger kept in the Palace of the Eternal Dragon on Zakuul during the Grand Festival of Empress Vaylin in 3630 BBY. After the Eternal Empress Vaylin's speech was interrupted by the arrival of the Alliance Commander and the former Emperor Arcann, Beast master Oleg went to combat invading Arcann's loyalists, accompanied by Cho'Kri and another vorn tiger named Cho'Ale. They were all killed during the three-way fighting in the Palace reception area.
Cho'Kri appears in Star Wars: The Old Republic: Knights of the Eternal Throne during "Chapter VI: The Dragon's Maw".
